basics.name: Juan Anibal Micheli
basics.label: Fullstack Javascript Engineer
basics.summary:
● Github profile: https://github.com/anaibol
● Website: https://anib.al

I am a creative, dynamic, curious, prolific web developer. I like feeling comfortable with the entire stack needed for a web project, from layout and client-side application structure, to backend development and server infrastructure. I am always pursuing new technologies, frameworks and libraries, and I believe web technologies will be soon a multi-platform standard, used for common mobile apps and even for programming robots! And of course, I am in love with Javascript :)

work.summary: Built an admin panel for administrating the main site entities. I used AngularJS and Bootstrap UI communicating with a RPC-JSON API with JWT based authentification.

Built an event promotion platform from scratch using MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS and Node.js.
Choice of technologies, decision taking, devising.
A lot of interaction with Facebook API (Graph API, FQL, invitations, RSVP..). SEO, web scraping, geospatial search, frontend performance optimization, POC with Polymer.

PHP, Symfony2, MySQL, Elastic Search, Redis, agile development.
Digital TV channel, music and sport fans.
I worked with Symfony2, a great PHP MVC framework, with Doctrine ORM, implemented Elasticsearch for indexing the entities and search them, and Redis for caching DB queries and with Nginx proxy for caching webpages.

PHP, NodeJS, Mongodb, MySQL, JQuery, Magento, social API's and some Magento e-commerce.
I worked in several little (2 weeks) projects, pressure and innovation in a digital agency.

work.position: Web Developer (PHP, Zend framework, MySQL, Frontend and Backend development)

PHP, Zend framework, OAuth, Facebook API
Football social network.

work.position: Fullstack Software Engineer (Flux, React, ES6, Docker Wordpress, Vagrant)
work.summary: Zehnergroup is a US based agency. Working remotely from Argentina and Europe I developed several projects. Some PHP and Wordpress on Vagrant, some beautiful static sites and some ES6 + Flux + React + Docker.
